text:
@realDonaldTrump "No, I don't take responsibility." Every damned day, you remind us why you've failed at responding to #COVID19. If there's credit, you try to steal it. If there's blame, you try to dodge it. You'll lie and deflect, and when all that fails, you run away.

#ThePresidentThatRanAway
